segments.text: I'm really surprised by what I'm seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, not noticing the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so bold, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, not caring about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, making a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed that the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, but the boy doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on, with the water overflowing and the children taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just full of surprises and unexpected moments.
segments.speaker: PAR
